item.title: PBR
item.description: score:21 Chances: Petrobras is taking steps to diversify its energy sources and ensure energy security amid infrastructure challenges The acquisition of International Renewable Energy Certificates shows the company’s commitment to renewable power generation Brazil’s Finance minister is considering releasing extra dividends for Petrobras investors Risks: Petrobras is increasingly exposed to volatile prices of liquefied natural gas (LNG) due to a regional gas deficit The company is facing charges for bribery in securing business with Brazil’s state-owned oil company The failure to gain traction with Bolivia on a pipeline shift may impact Brazil’s gas supplies Score:21 chances characters count - risks characters count = 21
